targetTaxonomicAssay: rRNA gene sequencing using primers 16S Kelly F and 16S Kelly R

Notes on Selection: NCOG time series, PR2 benchmarked primer set
Other notes: NCOG protocol is for a 1-step PCR; Roscoff uses an updated reverse V4 primer from Piredda et al. 2017 (https://doi.org/10.1093/femsec/fiw200)

targetTaxonomicAssay: 18S rRNA gene sequencing using primers Ceph18S_F and Ceph18S_R
12S rRNA gene sequencing targeting the V5-V6 region using primers MiFish-F V2 and MiFish-R
12S rRNA gene sequencing targeting the V5-V6 region using primers MiFish-U-F_mod and MiFish-R

targetTaxonomicScope: Also captures non-target: Vertebrates including marine mammals, birds, reptiles
Notes on Selection: MURI tested; 2 x 150 PE sequencing also acceptable for sequencing
Other notes: The forward MiFish primer was modified in Sales et al. 2019 although it is not explicitly stated in the manuscript. MURI (NWFSC, SWFSC, UW, SIO)

targetTaxonomicAssay: 12S rRNA gene sequencing targeting the V5-V6 region using primers MiFish-U-F  and MiFish-R

Notes on Selection: Protocol has been used for datasets but currently undergoing testing and revision of PCR conditions for future 12S work to optimize diversity
Widely adopted and most benchmarked, MBARI using this with Rockfish cruises
